page.title: 17TRANSPORT
page.content: The railway has an air shaft at the end of the railway line.Deer park road is bumpy and has little traffic but it has a lot of caravans in the summer. Eastnor village has quite a few roads including the Castle roads.The traffic in Eastnor is busy in the summer beca- -use of the many tourists.White house farm has a road by the side of it which is often used as a short cut by local people.R.A.F. air craft often fly very low overhead as they practice their special techniques.Few lorries come though Eastnor village,many cars but few vans.There is one railway line which is the main line to Worcester and Hereford.Deer park road goes to Netherton Farm.Lower Mitchell farm has a road by the side of it which goes to Ledbury and Malvern.
